Meaning IN CONTEXT: (vinaya) offence involving defeat; transgression requiring expulsion
Commentary:
(VIN 6.8.5) pārājikan'ti yaṃ vuttaṃ,
taṃ suṇohi yathātathaṃ,
cuto paraddho bhaṭṭho ca,
saddhammā hi niraṅkato,
saṃvāso'pi tahiṃ n'atthi,
ten'etaṃ iti vuccati.
(VINa) pārājiko'ti parājito, parājayaṃ āpanno.
Example1: duṭṭhullā nāma āpatti cattāri ca pārājikāni terasa ca saṅghādisesā.
eng-old: (vinaya) offence involving defeat; transgression requiring expulsion

Meaning IN CONTEXT: (vinaya) offence requiring confession
Commentary:
(VIN 6.8.5) pācittiyan'ti yaṃ vuttaṃ,
taṃ suṇohi yathātathaṃ,
pāteti kusalaṃ dhammaṃ,
ariyamaggaṃ aparajjhati,
cittasaṃmohanaṭṭhānaṃ,
ten'etaṃ iti vuccati.
Example1: niṭṭhitacīvarasmiṃ bhikkhunā ubbhatasmiṃ kaṭhine das'āhaparamaṃ atirekacīvaraṃ dhāretabbaṃ. taṃ atikkāmayato, nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ.
Example2: sampajānamusāvāde, pācittiyaṃ.
eng-old: (vinaya) offence requiring confession
